column4: fresh install of ubuntu, i dont remember it asking for a root user/password, i only created one user. how do i become root?
wiki.ubuntu.com/RootSudo
thanks
the installer explained this and made you hit 'enter' at one point...
i installed konsole from synaptic, but cant seem to launch it or find it, any ideas?
alt-f2 konsole <enter>
thank you :)
you can use the menu editor "smeg" to put it in the menu if you like
it launched konsole, but i am used to typing MC to get midnight commander. this didnt work ,what have i done wrong?
did you install mc?
,no. i thought it was a part of konsole, i installed konsole
no, midnight commander is another program that existed for about ten years before konsole did
install "mc" with your packagemananegemtn tool of choice
thanks , i will try to do that.
i search in synaptic package manager for midnight commander, it only finds the konsole that i installed earlier. is there another search place i can use with synaptic?
it's in universe in the package called "mc"
thanks again
select, middle click to paste it
why are some software sources disabled by default?
because people should know they're going to install unsupported or non-free crap before selecting it in synaptic
